markdownRemark.html:
Howdy, y’all!

So, June and July have been some hectic months. I moved to Texas, started a new job and have been slowly getting settled in and exploring my new city. This has kind of put a damper on my energy and focus to write and put out new content. But, I am starting to feel more settled, so I plan on starting to make more time for writing and creating new content for the site.

As part of this, I want to start highlighting some of the items I read each week that really open my eyes. You know, another generic weekly roundup type of blog post.

frontmatter.title: A Brief Catch Up & Currently Reading
frontmatter.description: After a short hiatus, I figured it was time to provide a brief update as to what has been going on in life and provide a brief list of some of the best things I've been reading lately.

frontmatter.title: Making Money isn't About Luck -- My Thoughts
